channel.title: Transcripts: Prof G Pod (Scott Galloway)
channel.description: YouTube video transcripts from Prof G Pod (Scott Galloway)

item.title: U.S. consumers are the “biggest losers”
item.description: The Supreme Court has officially struck down the majority of President Trump’s tariffs. Scott Galloway and Jessica Tarlov discuss the implications for the U.S. economy, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: “This is Warfare”
item.description: Speaker Pelosi joins Jessica Tarlov to addresses the Trump-induced anxiety surrounding election integrity, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: Beyond the Red Coat
item.description: Speaker Emerita Pelosi joins Jessica Tarlov to reflect on her iconic career moments and reveals what she actually considers her greatest achievement, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: “I’ve never been more grateful to be on this podcast”
item.description: Jessica Tarlov catches Scott Galloway hiding out from his family vacation, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: State of the Union LIVESTREAM — Join us Tuesday after the speech!
item.description:
Planning on skipping the State of the Union? Let us watch it for you. After the speech ends, join Jessica Tarlov and Jessiah from @ponderingpolitics for a livestream discussion. We’ll unpack the essential moments, the most outrageous lies, and get you up to speed on what you missed.
It all starts on Tuesday 2/24, right after the speech ends — probably around 10:30PM ET. Get subscribed NOW so you don’t miss it!
Follow Jessica Tarlov, @JessicaTarlov. Follow Prof G, @profgalloway. Follow Raging Moderates, @RagingModeratesPod.
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel: @RagingModerates

item.title: LIVE - State of the Union Postgame Analysis (with @ponderingpolitics)
item.description: Did you miss Trump's State of the Union speech? Or — did you see it, and need a place to vent? Join us LIVE, as Jessica Tarlov and Jessiah Eberlin of @ponderingpolitics discuss, analyze, and pick apart the speech's notable moments.

item.title: The Democrats Need to Start Lying
item.description: Jessica Tarlov and Jessiah Eberlin of @ponderingpolitics talk about what Democrats’ strategy should be, in response to Trump’s State of the Union Address, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: Trump as role model “really haunts me”
item.description: Scott Galloway and Jessica Tarlov discuss the men Trump celebrated in the State of the Union address, and the women he left out, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: Trump’s “FORGETTABLE” Speech Was a DISASTER and DANGEROUS
item.description:
Scott Galloway and Jessica Tarlov break down Trump’s marathon State of the Union — the longest in history — and the alternate reality he painted of a “golden age” America, even as most voters say the country is on the wrong track. They dig into the speech’s biggest moments: the attacks on Democrats, the swipe at the Supreme Court over tariffs, and Trump’s mixed message on Iran — diplomacy, but with the door wide open to military action. Did the speech help him? And are we actually edging toward war? Then, the Democratic split screen. From Abigail Spanberger’s affordability-focused rebuttal to protests inside and outside the chamber — the party showed unity in opposition to Trump, but real divisions on strategy heading into the midterms. Finally, the Pentagon’s escalating clash with AI firm Anthropic. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth is threatening to invoke the Defense Production Act unless the company lifts restrictions on how its models can be used by the military.
Trump’s many lies during the State of the Union address The Democrats’ fractured response Secretary Pete Hegseth’s ultimatum to Anthropic
Follow Jessica Tarlov, @JessicaTarlov Follow Prof G, @TheProfGPod Follow Raging Moderates, @RagingModerates
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@RagingModerates

item.title: Iran: “I do believe we’re going in”
item.description: Trump didn’t announce any plans for conflict with Iran in his State of the Union address. Was that on purpose? Scott Galloway and Jessica Tarlov discuss, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: Don’t Look at Your Grocery Bill
item.description: Despite Trump’s enthusiasm, there are some major signs that the U.S. economy isn’t in such great shape. Scott Galloway and Jessica Tarlov discuss, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: The Pentagon’s AI Ultimatum: Anthropic Under Fire
item.description: Is the U.S. military overstepping? Scott Galloway and Jessica Tarlov break down the escalating clash between the Pentagon and Anthropic, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: Hillary Clinton is Consistently VILIFIED
item.description: Hillary Clinton is testifying behind closed doors about her ties to Jeffrey Epstein. Jessica Tarlov and Aaron Parnas predict the fallout, and discuss the implications for the overall Epstein investigation, on Raging Moderates.

item.title: Hillary Clinton Accuses GOP of Trump COVER-UP in Epstein Case
item.description:
Jessica Tarlov and Aaron Parnas (@aaronparnas1) break down what the Clintons’ closed-door depositions could actually mean for the Epstein investigation — and what Republicans realistically expect to uncover. JD Vance kicks off his new “war on fraud” by freezing Medicaid funds — is it real reform or 2028 positioning? Plus: FBI shakeups tied to the Trump investigations, escalating tensions with Iran as military strike options are quietly drafted, and Kamala Harris once again teasing a possible presidential run.
Clintons’ depositions in the Epstein investigation JD Vance’s new “war on fraud” If the U.S. is gearing up to strike Iran Whether Kamala Harris really “might” run…again
Follow Jessica Tarlov, @JessicaTarlov Follow Prof G, @TheProfGPod Follow Raging Moderates, @RagingModerates
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@RagingModerates

item.title: Trump Sets Up JD Vance to Fail?
item.description: JD Vance makes his first big move as “Fraud Czar” by suspending $259M in Medicaid funds to Minnesota. Jessica Tarlov and Aaron Parnas discuss what this all means, on Raging Moderates.
